• Multiplayer mining game with real-time MQTT networking integration
  • Procedural tile-based world generation with varied minerals and depth mechanics
  • Robust inventory system with crafting, shop upgrades, and resource management

    this.client = mqtt.connect(broker, options);

Mego Miner Online features multiplayer mining gameplay using MQTT networking for real-time synchronization between players. Core mechanics include resource gathering via tile excavation, upgradable equipment tiers, and temperature-based survival challenges. The UI includes interactive dashboards for inventory management, player statistics tracking, and a procedural minimap display.
